title: BRIEF-Yangtze River Port And Logistics Files A Complaint With FINRA To Report "Abusive Trading Practices​"
text: March 6, 2018 / 2:14 PM / Updated 18 minutes ago BRIEF-Yangtze River Port And Logistics Files A Complaint With FINRA To Report "Abusive Trading Practices​" Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 6 (Reuters) - Yangtze River Port And Logistics Ltd : * YANGTZE RIVER PORT AND LOGISTICS - ‍ON MARCH 5 FILED A COMPLAINT WITH FINRA TO REPORT CERTAIN “ABUSIVE TRADING PRACTICES​” * YANGTZE RIVER PORT AND LOGISTICS SAYS ‍SINCE LISTING ON NASDAQ, CO HAS NOTICED PATTERN OF “UNUSUAL” TRADING PRACTICES & ACTIVITY​ -SEC FILING * YANGTZE RIVER PORT AND LOGISTICS - ‍BELIEVES IT IS SUBJECT TO “ILLEGAL SHORT-SELLING AND MARKET PRICE MANIPULATION”, REPORTED THE SAME TO FINRA​ * YANGTZE RIVER PORT AND LOGISTICS - ‍IMPLEMENTED CERTAIN STEPS, CONSIDERING OTHER APPROPRIATE MEASURES TO COUNTER "ILLEGAL ACTIVITIES​" Source text: ( bit.ly/2oTJx2Z )
